entries.journal_entry_description: Lyman Zavala is a very important person in Tyrena, and he has asked for your help.
entries.task00_journal_entry_description: Lyman wants you to hit the local Chirq Council thugs and gather evidence of their recent criminal activities.
entries.task01_comm_message_text: That should be enough evidence. We need something to tie them in with Greck's people. See what you can find.
entries.task02_journal_entry_description: You have enough evidence on the Chirq's to tie them to something, even though you're not sure what. Try finding some evidence on the Grecks that ties them in with the Chirq council.
entries.task03_comm_message_text: I think I might have found something. See if you can get inside the Greck Compound and recover an item called the Dark Spirit Device.
entries.task04_journal_entry_description: Captain Dool has linked the Grecks and the Chirq to an item called the Dark Spirit Device. See if you can find the item and bring it back to Captain Dool.
entries.task05_comm_message_text: Excellent. I have something else. There's a chance that Olag Greck himself might be somewhere inside the compound. I'm going to send you to my friend Takouhi for more information.
